product_name: Oakley Swim  Dawn Patrol Long Triangle Bikini Top - Women's
long_description: From surfing at sunrise to evening bonfires on the beach, the Oakley Dawn Patrol Long Triangle Bikini Top stays comfortable all day long so you can keep your focus on having fun.
